trustfund:
TF032957-EASTERN EUROPE
            (ARMENIA,GEORGIA) - STRUCTURAL ADJUSTMENT,TF032956-EASTERN EUROPE
            (ARMENIA,GEORGIA) - STRUCTURAL ADJUSTMENT,TF032955-EASTERN EUROPE
            (ARMENIA,GEORGIA) - STRUCTURAL ADJUSTMENT,TF032954-EASTERN EUROPE
            (GEORGIA,ARMENIA) - STRUCTURAL ADJUSTMENT,TF022071-STRUCTURAL ADJUSTMENT CREDIT

abstracts.cdata!:
The primary objective of the Structural
            Adjustment Credit is to support the Government's reform
            program to stabilize the economy and create conditions for a
            resumption of growth and an improvement in living standards.
            This will be achieved through: 1) provision of foreign
            exchange for the purchase of critical imports, particularly
            for the private sector; 2) budgetary support, especially for
            the strengthening of the social safety net for the most
            vulnerable groups; and 3) providing a framework for
            urgently-needed financial assistance from other donors. The
            program includes policies that: a) reorient the role of the
            state away from direct management of the economy towards
            support of private sector development; b) result in improved
            financial discipline for enterprises and banks; and c)
            improve the targeting of the social services and benefits to
            the most needy.
